Title: Object: Bataille des Pyramides
Description: Equestrian portrait of Napoleon against background of battle of the Pyramids. 1836 Engraving
Curator's comments: illustration to A Thiers, Historie de la Révolution française, Paris 1837
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (47)
Associated names: Representation of: Napoléon I, Emperor of the French (Napoleon)
Associated events: Associated Event: Napoleon's campaign in Egypt 1798 - 1799
